title: Webfont alternative to Domaine Sans?
content: I'm working on a website for a client where I've been sketching with Domaine Sans Display Light on large main titles. It says coming soon on Klim Type's website and I have been crossing my fingers, but the deadline is closing in and I will have to find an alternative. Does anyone have a suggestion for an alternative sans that has a similar combination of elegance and lightness?
author: Thord

comments.content:
Domaine Sans is such a specific face. However, one of the following might work for you:

Maple:  
 [http://processtypefoundry.com/fonts/maple/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192248/http:/processtypefoundry.com/fonts/maple/ "http://processtypefoundry.com/fonts/maple/")

Perry Grotesque:  
 [https://ourtype.com/#/try/pro-fonts/parry-grotesque/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192248/https:/ourtype.com/#/try/pro-fonts/parry-grotesque/ "https://ourtype.com/#/try/pro-fonts/parry-grotesque/")

Supria Sans:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/supria-sans/webfont\_preview.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/supria-sans/webfont_preview.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/supria-sans/webfont\_preview.html")

Bureau Grot:  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192248/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrot/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrot/")
